summary: MY DASHBOARD ON MY 2019 HONDA RIDGELINE IS MELTING. IT CAUSES A GLARE THAT IS REFLECTED OFF OF THE WINDSHIELD AND INTO THE DRIVERS EYES. THE HONDA FACTORY REPRESENTATIVE SAID THEY WILL NOT REPLACE IT! THIS VEHICLE IS ONLY THREE MONTHS OLD WITH 4302 MILES ON THE ODOMETER! IT WAS DETERMINED TO BE INFERIOR MATERIALS IN OTHER AUTO MANUFACTURERS VEHICLES!
